name: Stranger Danger
description:
Sometimes, the people you meet online aren't as nice as they seem... Play as a young kid who met up with his online friend and now needs to RUN! And also dodge cars, dogs, and piles of mud!

Project built for 2020 SGDA Game Jam.

Credits:
Made by Aaron Shah (programmer), Jarred Allen (programmer/writer), Ming-Wei Hung (artist), and Anke Shao (composer).
We used the Amethyst game engine to make our game.

The source code can be found here:
https://github.com/AaronShah2/SGDA_Game_Jam_Proj
